results.title: Simvastatin-Ezetimibe enhances growth factor expression and attenuates neuron loss in the hippocampus in a model of intracerebral hemorrhage
results.text_hl: Animals were divided into four groups: (i) sham, which underwent a scalp incision only (n = 6); (ii) controls, which were administered @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@ICH@@@ without therapy (n = 8); (iii) @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (n = 8); and (iv) @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-@CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ combination therapy (n = 8).
